I2C SVT UVM Documentation - Protocol Checks Defined in VIP

Summay of Protocol Checks defined in I2C SVT UVM Documentation:

Product Base Group Protocol Check Class
i2c_svt SMBUS Spec v3.0 svt_i2c_err_check
I3C Specs v0.9r1 svt_i2c_err_check
i2c specs 2.1 svt_i2c_err_check
i2c specs 3.0 svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 3.0 svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 2.1 svt_i2c_err_check
CCI Specs 1.01.00 svt_i2c_err_check

Product: i2c_svt - Protocol Checks Details:

Group Sub Group Protocol Check Instance name Reference Description Error Category Protocol Check Class
SMBUS Spec v3.0 Protocol Check smbus_only_quick_cmd_support SMBUS Spec v3.0 A SMBus device that supports QUICK command should be only driven with QUICK command on bus. ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
SMBUS Spec v3.0 Protocol Check smbus_no_quick_cmd_support SMBUS Spec v3.0 A SMBus device that does not supports QUICK command should not be driven one with. ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
SMBUS Spec v3.0 Protocol Check smbus_invalid_response SMBUS Spec v3.0 A SMBus device must always acknowledge ACK its own address. ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
SMBUS Spec v3.0 Timing Check smbus_tlow_min_100khz SMBUS Spec v3.0 Minimum of high to low transition is not tlow:min - tsetup_data for 100khz ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
SMBUS Spec v3.0 Timing Check smbus_tlow_min_400khz SMBUS Spec v3.0 Minimum of high to low transition is not tlow:min - tsetup_data for 400khz ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
SMBUS Spec v3.0 Timing Check smbus_tlow_min_1mhz SMBUS Spec v3.0 Minimum of high to low transition is not tlow:min - tsetup_data for 1mhz ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
SMBUS Spec v3.0 Timing Check smbus_invalid_stop SMBUS Spec v3.0 Invalid stop condition ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
SMBUS Spec v3.0 Timing Check smbus_invalid_start SMBUS Spec v3.0 Invalid start condition ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
SMBUS Spec v3.0 Timing Check smbus_data_transition_during_clk_high SMBUS Spec v3.0 Data Transition occured during clock high ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
SMBUS Spec v3.0 Timing Check smbus_tlow_mext_violation SMBUS Spec v3.0 Clock is held low by master for more than tlow:mext ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
SMBUS Spec v3.0 Timing Check smbus_tlow_sext_violation SMBUS Spec v3.0 Clock is held low by slave for more than tlow:sext ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
SMBUS Spec v3.0 Protocol Check smbus_arp_not_acked SMBUS Spec v3.0 Prepare to ARP is not acknowledged by any of the slaves during ARP process ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
SMBUS Spec v3.0 Protocol Check smbus_arp_random_no_not_reset SMBUS Spec v3.0 Random device number is not reset after reset command in ARP process ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
SMBUS Spec v3.0 Protocol Check smbus_reserved_cmd_detected SMBUS Spec v3.0 Reserved ARP Command is detected ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
SMBUS Spec v3.0 Protocol Check smbus_invalid_data_cmd_acked SMBUS Spec v3.0 An invalid command or data is acked ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
SMBUS Spec v3.0 Protocol Check smbus_dynamic_slave_address_assigned SMBUS Spec v3.0 The slave address is already assined to a different slave ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
SMBUS Spec v3.0 Protocol Check smbus_get_udid_data_count_mismatch SMBUS Spec v3.0 The number of data bytes in get udid response in not 'd17 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
SMBUS Spec v3.0 Protocol Check smbus_repeated_start_not_detected SMBUS Spec v3.0 Repeated start is not detected in case of read or process command ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
SMBUS Spec v3.0 Protocol Check smbus_block_process_max_count SMBUS Spec v3.0 The number of data bytes in write and read of block process is more than 255 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
SMBUS Spec v3.0 Protocol Check smbus_wr64_data_size_mismatch SMBUS Spec v3.0 The number of data bytes in write 64 command is not 64 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
SMBUS Spec v3.0 Protocol Check smbus_wr32_data_size_mismatch SMBUS Spec v3.0 The number of data bytes in write 32 command is not 32 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
SMBUS Spec v3.0 Protocol Check smbus_rd32_data_size_mismatch SMBUS Spec v3.0 The number of data bytes in read 32 command is not 32 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
SMBUS Spec v3.0 Protocol Check smbus_rd64_data_size_mismatch SMBUS Spec v3.0 The number of data bytes in read 64 command is not 64 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
SMBUS Spec v3.0 Protocol Check smbus_data_size_mismatch SMBUS Spec v3.0 The block count and the number of data bytes received don't match ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
SMBUS Spec v3.0 Protocol Check smbus_pec_mismatch SMBUS Spec v3.0 Recieved PEC and Calculated PEC don't match ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
SMBUS Spec v3.0 Timing Check smbus_clk_low_timeout SMBUS Spec v3.0 Clock is held low for more than the given time ttimeout_min ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I3C Specs v0.9r1 Protocol Check i3c_invalid_dynamic_address I3C Specs v1.0 Invalid dynamic address in CCC. ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I3C Specs v0.9r1 Protocol Check i3c_incorrect_ack_on_addr_already_changed_by_setdasa I3C Specs v0.9r1 After getting Dynamic Address through SETDASA, the slave must operate as I3C Slave and must not ACK their static address. ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I3C Specs v0.9r1 Protocol Check i3c_master_stops_entdaa_after_two_nack I3C Specs v0.9r1 I3C Main Master must exit the DAA procedure after maximum number of attempts 2 for the same slave. ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I3C Specs v0.9r1 Protocol Check i3c_addr_header_after_repeated_start I3C Specs v0.9r1 The Address header following a Repeated START is always driven on SDA using Push-Pull. ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I3C Specs v0.9r1 Protocol Check i3c_hotjoin_bus_idle_time I3C Specs v0.9r1 I3C Slave can generate Hot-Join request after 1ms of Bus Idle time. ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I3C Specs v0.9r1 Protocol Check i3c_sr_entdaa_ccc_t_bit I3C Specs v0.9r1 I3C Master must transmit Sr after ENTDAA CCC+T-bit ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I3C Specs v0.9r1 Protocol Check i3c_ack_brdcst_wr I3C Specs v0.9r1 All I3C Slaves must ACK the Broadcast Write 0x7E+W. ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I3C Specs v0.9r1 Protocol Check i3c_reserved_add I3C Specs v0.9r1 While assigning Dynamic Address, I3C Master shall not use any of 0x00, 0x01, 0x002, 0x7E, 0x7F. All are reserved for I3C. ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I3C Specs v0.9r1 Protocol Check i3c_rd_tbit_0_no_stop_sr I3C Specs v0.9r1 I3C Slave sends 0 as T-bit after Read Data byte but Master doesnot generate STOP/Sr. ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I3C Specs v0.9r1 Protocol Check i3c_wr_data_tbit I3C Specs v0.9r1 Incorrect T-Bit for Write Data Bytes. ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I3C Specs v0.9r1 Protocol Check i3c_dyn_addr_tbit I3C Specs v0.9r1 Incorrect T-Bit for Dynamic Address. ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I3C Specs v0.9r1 Protocol Check i3c_setdasa_tbit I3C Specs v0.9r1 Incorrect T-Bit for SETDASA CCC. ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I3C Specs v0.9r1 Protocol Check i3c_entdaa_tbit I3C Specs v0.9r1 Incorrect T-Bit for ENTDAA CCC. ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
i2c specs 2.1 Protocol Check i2c_ack_to_invalid_second_byte_after_gen_call i2c specs 2.1 After the general call, devices must ignore the second byte with values other than 8'h04 or 8'h06 when LSB is 1'b0. Sec# 10.1.1 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
i2c specs 2.1 Protocol Check i2c_invalid_second_byte_after_gen_call i2c specs 2.1 The value of second byte after general call should not be other than 8'h04 or 8'h06 when LSB is 1'b0. Sec# 10.1.1 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
i2c specs 3.0 timing check i2c_high_clk_duration_cfg_value_fast_mode_plus i2c specs 3.0 High clk duration of SCL is checked against configured value in Fast Mode Plus. sec# 6 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
i2c specs 3.0 timing check i2c_high_clk_duration_cfg_value_hs_mode i2c specs 3.0 High clk duration of SCL is checked against configured value in Highspeed mode. sec# 6 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
i2c specs 3.0 timing check i2c_high_clk_duration_cfg_value_fast_mode i2c specs 3.0 High clk duration of SCL is checked against configured value in Fast mode. sec# 6 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
i2c specs 3.0 timing check i2c_high_clk_duration_cfg_value_standard_mode i2c specs 3.0 High clk duration of SCL is checked against configured value in Standard mode. sec# 6 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
i2c specs 3.0 timing check i2c_low_clk_duration_cfg_value_fast_mode_plus i2c specs 3.0 Low clk duration of SCL is checked against configured value in Fast Mode Plus. sec# 6 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
i2c specs 3.0 timing check i2c_low_clk_duration_cfg_value_hs_mode i2c specs 3.0 Low clk duration of SCL is checked against configured value in Highspeed mode. sec# 6 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
i2c specs 3.0 timing check i2c_low_clk_duration_cfg_value_fast_mode i2c specs 3.0 Low clk duration of SCL is checked against configured value in Fast mode. sec# 6 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
i2c specs 3.0 timing check i2c_low_clk_duration_cfg_value_standard_mode i2c specs 3.0 Low clk duration of SCL is checked against configured value in Standard mode. sec# 6 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
i2c specs 3.0 timing check i2c_hold_time_start_cfg_value_fast_mode_plus i2c specs 3.0 Hold time value checked against configured value for start in fast mode plus. sec# 6 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
i2c specs 3.0 timing check i2c_hold_time_start_cfg_value_hs_mode i2c specs 3.0 Hold time value checked against configured value for start in hs mode. sec# 6 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
i2c specs 3.0 timing check i2c_hold_time_start_cfg_value_fast_mode i2c specs 3.0 Hold time value checked against configured value for start in fast mode. sec# 6 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 3.0 Timing Check i2c_hold_time_start_cfg_value_standard_mode I2C Specs 3.0 Hold time value checked against configured value for start in Standard Speed Mode. Sec# 6 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 3.0 Timing Check i2c_low_clk_duration_fast_mode_plus I2C Specs 3.0 Invalid Low clock duration for Fast Mode Plus speed. Sec# 15 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 3.0 Timing Check i2c_high_clk_duration_fast_mode_plus I2C Specs 3.0 Invalid High clock duration for Fast Mode Plus speed. Sec# 15 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check

I2C Specs 3.0 Timing Check i2c_setup_time_violation_data_fast_mode_plus I2C Specs 3.0 Set up time violation for DATA in Fast Mode Plus speed. Sec# 15 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 3.0 Timing Check i2c_setup_time_violation_stop_fast_mode_plus I2C Specs 3.0 Set up time violation for STOP in Fast Mode Plus speed. Sec# 15 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 3.0 Timing Check i2c_setup_time_violation_start_fast_mode_plus I2C Specs 3.0 Set up time violation for REPEATED START in Fast Mode Plus speed. Sec# 15 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 3.0 Timing Check i2c_invalid_tbuf_time_fm_plus I2C Specs 3.0 Bus is not idle for TBUF time after STOP in Fast Mode Plus speed. Sec# 15.1 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 2.1 Timing Check i2c_setup_time_stop_cfg_value_fast_mode_plus I2C Specs 2.1 Set up time value is checked againt configured value for STOP in Fast Mode Plus. Sec# 15 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 2.1 Timing Check i2c_setup_time_stop_cfg_value_hs_mode I2C Specs 2.1 Set up time value is checked againt configured value for STOP in HS Mode. Sec# 15 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 2.1 Timing Check i2c_setup_time_stop_cfg_value_fast_mode I2C Specs 2.1 Set up time value is checked againt configured value for STOP in Fast Speed Mode. Sec# 15 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 2.1 Timing Check i2c_setup_time_stop_cfg_value_standard_mode I2C Specs 2.1 Set up time value is checked againt configured value for STOP in Standard Speed Mode. Sec# 15 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 2.1 Protocol Check i2c_rd_inval_stop_after_ack I2C Specs 2.1 In case of READ command, master should not generate STOP after ACK. Sec# 7.2 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 2.1 Protocol Check i2c_bit_level_clk_stretch_in_hs I2C Specs 2.1 Bit-Level Clock Stretching is NOT allowed in HS-mode. Sec# 8.3 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 2.1 Protocol Check i2c_start_immediately_followed_by_stop I2C Specs 2.1 START condition immediately followed by a STOP condition is an illegal format. Sec# 9 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 2.1 Protocol Check i2c_xz_sda I2C Specs 2.1 X or Z observed on SDA. ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 2.1 Protocol Check i2c_xz_scl I2C Specs 2.1 X or Z observed on SCL. ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 2.1 Protocol Check i2c_10b_slv_addr_fst_rd_cmd I2C Specs 2.1 10 bit slave id First Byte should be write command if the slave was not already adderssed ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 2.1 Protocol Check i2c_invalid_speed_mode_after_hs_repeted_start I2C Specs 2.1 Invalid Speed mode after HS REPEATED START. Sec# 13.5 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 2.1 Protocol Check i2c_invalid_fast_to_hs_switch_time I2C Specs 2.1 Invalid Fast to HS switch time. Sec# 13.2 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 2.1 Protocol Check i2c_invalid_master_id_transmit_speed I2C Specs 2.1 Master ID should be transmitted in Fast Speed mode. Sec# 13.2 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 2.1 Protocol Check i2c_general_call_followed_by_0000_0000 I2C Specs 2.1 General call should not be followed by 8'b0000_0000. Sec# 10.1 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 2.1 Protocol Check i2c_master_id_followed_by_ack I2C Specs 2.1 Master ID should not be followed by ACK. Sec# 13.2 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 2.1 Protocol Check i2c_start_byte_followed_by_ack I2C Specs 2.1 START Byte should be followed by NACK. Sec# 10.1 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 2.1 Protocol Check i2c_ack_received_for_invalid_slave_id I2C Specs 2.1 ACK should not be received for reserved SLAVE ID. Sec# 10.1 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 2.1 Protocol Check i2c_invalid_reserved_slave_id I2C Specs 2.1 Reserved SLAVE ID should not be transmitted by master. Sec# 10.1 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 2.1 Protocol Check i2c_hs_invalid_high_low_ratio I2C Specs 2.1 HIGH to LOW ratio of SCL in High Speed mode should be 1:2. Sec# 13.1 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 2.1 Protocol Check i2c_not_gen_repeated_start_or_stop_after_nack I2C Specs 2.1 Master has to generate REPEATED START or STOP after receiving Not ACK. Sec# 7.2 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 2.1 Protocol Check i2c_dsize_size_8_bit I2C Specs 2.1 Complete data byte not transmitted. Sec# 7.1 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 2.1 Protocol Check i2c_invalid_data_change I2C Specs 2.1 Data should not be changed during high period of SCL. Sec# 6.1 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 2.1 Timing Check i2c_low_clk_duration_high_speed_mode I2C Specs 2.1 Invalid Low clock duration for High Speed mode. Sec# 15 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 2.1 Timing Check i2c_high_clk_duration_high_speed_mode I2C Specs 2.1 Invalid High clock duration for High Speed mode. Sec# 15 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 2.1 Timing Check i2c_hold_time_violation_data_hs_mode I2C Specs 2.1 Hold time violation for DATA in High Speed mode. Sec# 15 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 2.1 Timing Check i2c_hold_time_violation_start_hs_mode I2C Specs 2.1 Hold time violation for START in High Speed mode. Sec# 15 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 2.1 Timing Check i2c_setup_time_violation_data_hs_mode I2C Specs 2.1 Set up time violation for DATA in High Speed mode. Sec# 15 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 2.1 Timing Check i2c_setup_time_violation_stop_hs_mode I2C Specs 2.1 Set up time violation for STOP in High Speed mode. Sec# 15 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check

I2C Specs 2.1 Timing Check i2c_high_clk_duration_fast_mode I2C Specs 2.1 Invalid High clock duration for Fast Speed mode. Sec# 15 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check

I2C Specs 2.1 Timing Check i2c_setup_time_violation_start_fast_mode I2C Specs 2.1 Set up time violation for REPEATED START in Fast Speed mode. Sec# 15 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
I2C Specs 2.1 Timing Check i2c_invalid_tbuf_time_fs I2C Specs 2.1 Bus is not idle for TBUF time after STOP in Fast Speed mode. Sec# 15.1 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check

I2C Specs 2.1 Protocol Check i2c_invalid_tbuf_time_ss I2C Specs 2.1 Bus is not idle for TBUF time after STOP in Standard Speed mode. Sec# 15.1 ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
CCI Specs 1.01.00 Protocol Check i2c_add_mode_cci CCI Specs 1.01.00 Invalid 10-bit Address Mode selected for CCI Mode. As per specs, only 7-bit Addressing is allowed. ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
CCI Specs 1.01.00 Protocol Check i2c_speed_cci CCI Specs 1.01.00 Invalid Speed Mode selected for CCI Mode. As per specs, only FAST MODE speed is allowed. ERROR svt_i2c_err_check
